DOC.brief_summary: Detect plasma Hsp90α concentration of liver cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign liver diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Quantitative Detection Kit for Hsp90α in Hepatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Detect plasma Hsp90α concentration of liver cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign liver diseases, validate accuracy, specificity and sensitivity of Hsp90α kit.
DOC.criteria: Liver cancer patients Healthy volunteers, Benign liver diseases patients Patients who Previously accepted radiotherapy
